Title: Linq to CRM for Silverlight
Description: Linq to CRM framework allows Silverlight application communicate with MS Dynamics CRM 2011 through the "LINQ to CRM" ORM layer.
HomeWiki:
Linq to CRM

Linq to CRM framework allows Silverlight application communicate with MS Dynamics CRM 2011 through the "LINQ to CRM" ORM layer.
For detailed instructions regarding how to use it go to documentation

If you experienced any issues write to us:

1) Discussions tab

2) Email discussion group: https://groups.google.com/d/forum/linq-to-crm-sl
